reasons: The candidate's answers are not relevant to the questions asked and lack detail.
There is a mismatch between the claimed experience in the resume and the responses given during the interview.
The candidate did not demonstrate any understanding of the core requirements of the role, specifically time series analysis and forecasting.
suggestions: Practice answering common data science interview questions with relevant examples.
Focus on aligning your responses with the specific requirements mentioned in the job description.
